question: Is this prayer considered to be on time?
answer:
QUESTION

What if you accidentally wake up one day 10 min before tulu, make wudu then pray fajr and once completing the preayer you see that there is only about 10 seconds left untill tulu according to the calendar. Is this prayer considered to be on time?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

If you performed your Fajr salah before the actual tulu (rising of the sun) as per the calendar, your salah will be valid.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalam



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
